title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open WebUI); chat, PDF, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java client
summary: Unofficial Java & Android SDK for Ollama; chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin turning Ollama models into a GitHub-Copilot-like code assistant.

title: ollama-chat – VS Code extension
summary: VS Code sidebar chat powered by any local Ollama model; no cloud required.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG template combining Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for Ollama: function-calling, voice, RAG, fine-tuning examples.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats or generates images using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server forwarding channel messages to Ollama and back.

title: ollama-cli – Go TUI
summary: Terminal UI client for Ollama written in Go; chat, manage models, conversation history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and persistence support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Unofficial Nim language wrapper for the Ollama REST API with async and streaming.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama for Rails apps; chat, embed, list models with ActiveRecord-like syntax.

title: ollama-r – R client
summary: Official lightweight R client for Ollama; chat and generate from R consoles or Shiny apps.
